SEALCOATING.TITLE: SEALCOATING
SEALCOATING.DESCRIPTION: Conservation and beautification of old pavements.

CONSTRUCCION.TITLE: Construction
CONSTRUCCION.DESCRIPTION: Placement of Asphalt Mixtures for vertical and horizontal roads.

SELLADO.TITLE: Sealing
SELLADO.DESCRIPTION: Construction of roads, bike paths, parking lots, sports fields.

MANTENIMIENTO.TITLE: Maintenance
MANTENIMIENTO.DESCRIPTION: Pothole patching, leveling and road rehabilitation.

FOOTER.ABOUT: Specialists in roads and transportation and experts in Project Management with more than 15 years in the pavement field

ESTYMA.NAME: Estyma
ESTYMA.QUOTE: Environmentally friendly, in strict compliance with technical specifications.

TICSA.NAME: Ticsa Grupo EPM
TICSA.QUOTE: They attend well to the needs throughout the Metropolitan Area of Medellín.

FEATURE.TITLE: Features
FEATURE.DESCRIPTION: The best solutions for pavements and roads.

HISTORIA.TITLE: HISTORY
HISTORIA.DESCRIPTION: led by Eng. Edwin Arrubla Jaramillo. Specialist in roads and transportation and Specialist in Project Management, with more than 15 years of experience only in the pavement field in the department of Antioquia.

VISION.TITLE: VISION
VISION.DESCRIPTION_PART2: will be a solid company to serve clients in the city of Medellín, Metropolitan Area, nearby East and the Department of Antioquia, with emphasis on the private sector such as horizontal property, as a company dedicated to road construction, Supply and Placement of Asphalt Mixtures.

TIPO_VIAS.TITLE: All types of roads
TIPO_VIAS.DESCRIPTION: Urbanizations, Parcelations, Residential Complexes, Bike Paths, Sports Fields, Parking Lots, Plazas, Pedestrian Paths, Hangars and Landing Strips.

GESTION_CONSTRUCCION.TITLE: Management and Construction
GESTION_CONSTRUCCION.DESCRIPTION: Civil Works, Mixtures, Patches, Potholes, Bumps and Leveling, Crack Sealing, Vertical and Horizontal Signage, Rejuvenation, conservation, protection and beautification of old pavements through SEALCOATING type asphalt seal.

SUMINISTRO_MANTENIMIENTO.TITLE: Supply and Maintenance
SUMINISTRO_MANTENIMIENTO.DESCRIPTION: Application of all types of Hot or Cold Asphalt Mixtures, Maintenance and Rehabilitation of Pavements.
